statements: UPDATE EmergencyResponseTeam SET location = 'Hospital' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE EmergencyResponseTeam SET contact_number = '123-456-7890', team_name = 'Emergency Team Alpha' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE EmergencyResponseTeam SET team_name = 'First Responders', location = 'City Center', contact_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE EmergencyResponseTeam SET location = 'Suburb Area', team_name = 'Emergency Response Squad', contact_number = '555-555-5555' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE nuclear_incidents SET incident_description='Leak in Reactor 4' WHERE incident_id=1;
UPDATE evacuation_guidelines SET evacuation_zone=3, instructions='Evacuate immediately' WHERE guideline_id=2;
UPDATE nuclear_incidents SET incident_description='Minor radiation leak reported in reactor 3', radiation_level=0.5 WHERE incident_id=101;
UPDATE evacuation_guidelines SET instructions='Evacuation recommended in zone 2 immediately', evacuation_zone=2 WHERE incident_id=101;
UPDATE NuclearIncidents SET location = 'Tokyo', radiation_level = 8.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE EvacuationGuidelines SET evacuation_order = 'Evacuate Immediately', evacuation_zone = 3 WHERE incident_id = 2;
UPDATE NuclearIncidents SET radiation_level = 7.5 WHERE incident_name = 'Chernobyl Incident';
UPDATE EvacuationGuidelines SET safety_instructions = 'Stay indoors and seal windows and doors with tape' WHERE incident_id = 10;
UPDATE Nuclear_Incidents SET location='New Location', description='Updated description' WHERE incident_id=1;
UPDATE Radiation_Levels SET value=3.5, date_time='2022-10-15 08:30:00.000' WHERE location='Radiation Station 2';
UPDATE Nuclear_Incidents SET location = 'Power Plant', description = 'Critical incident at plant' WHERE incident_id = 101
UPDATE Radiation_Levels SET value = 7.89, date_time = '2022-08-15 17:30:00' WHERE level_id = 201
UPDATE Nuclear_Incidents SET radiation_level = 8.765 WHERE incident_id = 101;
UPDATE Evacuation_Guidelines SET evacuation_route = 'Highway 1, Exit 5' WHERE evacuation_id = 201;
UPDATE Nuclear_Incidents SET radiation_level = 15.678, incident_location = 'Power Plant B' WHERE incident_id = 101;
UPDATE Evacuation_Guidelines SET evacuation_route = 'Highway 101 North', evacuation_instructions = 'Follow the signs for emergency shelters' WHERE evacuation_id = 201;
